2.1.0.name: micromatch
2.1.0.description: Glob matching for javascript/node.js. A drop-in replacement and faster alternative to minimatch and multimatch (10-45x faster on avg). Just use `minimatch.isMatch()` instead of `multimatch()` or `minimatch()`.

2.1.1.name: micromatch
2.1.1.description: Glob matching for javascript/node.js. A drop-in replacement and faster alternative to minimatch and multimatch (10-45x faster on avg). Just use `minimatch.isMatch()` instead of `multimatch()` or `minimatch()`.

2.1.2.name: micromatch
2.1.2.description: Glob matching for javascript/node.js. A drop-in replacement and faster alternative to minimatch and multimatch. Just use `micromatch.isMatch()` instead of `minimatch()`, or use `micromatch()` instead of `multimatch()`.
